name: 🐣Fire Roast🧨: Barbecue Escape
description:
😤In Roast? Or not ... Fire Roast has a choice.

Run away from the barbecue, show the power of the chicken.

🔪You have to strain and focus a bit to help the chicken get out and not become a victim of barbecue.

* Try gyro mode, feel the fried chicken in your hand.

* Improve your chicken.

❌With each level, complexity increases, and your chick becomes on the dark side.

Upgrade your chicken to make it easier to complete levels. And do not forget to change its color.

👶🏼With each improvement, your chick gets stronger and you get more ketchup.

Spend earned ketchup to increase the size and strength of your chicken, as well as reduce the waiting time of the timer at difficult levels.

❤Shake your smartphone to avoid fire.

With each fire extinguisher assembled, your ketchup multiplies and as a result of the game you get more ketchup.

💛Play and grow.
